description: LARGE 2 BEDROOM PLUS DEN move-in ready townhome walking distance to shopping and amenities. This home has been tastefully updated with a new stylish kitchen, laundry room and new flooring. The kitchen has all new cabinets, countertops, appliances, sink and fixtures. The living space is large and open with a cozy gas fireplace and opens to a fully covered private balcony. There is a bonus flex space on the main floor - perfect for a home office or kids play area! Upstairs you'll find 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a laundry room. The primary bedroom will easily fit your king size bed. The laundry room is fully renovated with full size side by side washer & dryer plus extra storage and clothes hanging space. There is a dedicated EV charger and 2 parking. Book a private showing.
